Contains the information to be used in the embed.
Displays time in a format similar to a message timestamp. Located next to the .
Contains the information to be used in the embed.
The hex code indicating an embed's accent color. Defaults to a random value when not set or -1.
The ID of the message being replied to with the embed.
An array of URIs for the attachments included in the embed, displayed below the element.
The URL of thumbnail of the embed, displayed as a medium-sized image in the top right corner of the embed.
The text that is placed above the description, usually highlighted. Also directs to a URL if one is given in , has a 256 character limit.
A link to an address of a webpage. When set, the becomes a clickable link, directing to the URL. Additionally, embeds of the same URL are grouped.
Creates an ephemeral message when set to true.
Contains an array of s to include in the embed
The ID of the user responsible for the embed's creation.
